name: Wilma and Buddy
description:
This game was made within 7 days for the Brackeys "Stronger Together"-themed Game Jam.  It was our first game jam we attended. We didn't came as far as we wanted, but it became a nice little prototype we're proud of.

Story Concept:
The small kingdom was a beautiful place to live... This changed suddenly one day as the good king and father of Wilma died after a serious illness. Since this day the stays in deep sadness. Until Princess Wilma and her Buddy follow their destiny to unchain her kingdom from the curtain of gray sorrow.
